dct_title_s: Santorinē / Santorini / Ioannis Tegopoulos, Stephanos Psimenos
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by gradient tints and spot heights. Tourist map with roads emphasized. Panel title. Includes color illustrations, map and publisher's index maps. Includes maps on verso: Ampelōnes periochēs Santorinēs = Vineyard areas of Santorini -- Archaiologikos chōros Akrotiríon = Archaeological site of Akrotiri. Tourist information on verso "108."
